articles.description: Bayern Munich could end the weekend 10 points off the Bundesliga's top spot after Freiburg snatch a late equaliser.
articles.title: Bayern drop points again with draw at Freiburg

articles.description: American Christian Coleman beats compatriot Noah Lyles to world indoor 60m gold in Glasgow.
articles.title: World Athletics Indoor Championships 2024: Christian Coleman beats Noah Lyles to 60m gold

articles.description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen puts in a crushing performance to set pole position for the season-opening Bahrain Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 qualifying: Max Verstappen takes pole in Bahrain for first race of the season

articles.description: Preview followed by live coverage of Sunday's Premier League game between Manchester City and Manchester United.
articles.title: Guardiola calls for calm heads in Manchester derby

articles.description: Football's rule makers are set to approve sin-bin trials - but the plan to bring in the use of blue cards looks likely to be ditched.
articles.title: Sin-bin trials set to be approved without blue cards

articles.description: Andrey Rublev is defaulted for unsportsmanlike conduct after yelling at a line judge in the semi-finals of the Dubai Tennis Championships.
articles.title: Andrey Rublev: Russian defaulted in Dubai semi-final for yelling at line judge

articles.description: Lazio have three players sent off, including two in injury time, as they lose to AC Milan in Serie A.
articles.title: Lazio finish with eight men in AC Milan defeat

articles.description: Saudi Arabia, the only contender for the 2034 World Cup, formally launches its bid for the tournament.
articles.title: Saudi Arabia launches formal 2034 World Cup bid

articles.description: Britain's Emma Raducanu receives a wildcard for the Indian Wells tournament as she continues her comeback from injury.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu: Briton handed Indian Wells wildcard

articles.description: British teenager Sky Brown says she is "super proud" despite failing to qualify for the Olympic surfing event at the Paris Games.
articles.title: Sky Brown: Teenager is 'super proud' despite failing in Olympic surfing qualifying bid
